issue.title: [Python/Java] Create RecordBatch from VectorSchemaRoot
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3583](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3583). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Besides the naming differences, `pyarrow.RecordBatch` is content-wise the same as a `org.apache.arrow.vector.VectorSchemaRoot`. This adds a conversion function to create a `pyarrow.RecordBatch` referencing these arrays.
